name: v0.7.2
notes:
1. Fix problem of checked value of `Stay in Front` doesn't depends on the window
2. Fix problem of window list doesn't show on dock menu
3. Add `Toggle Developer Tools` item to context menu
4. Add `Clear AsyncStorage` item in context menu
5. Handle fatal errors thrown by the Chrome debugger (from RN upstream)
6. [macOS] Use icon instead of text for Touch Bar
7. Upgrade react-devtools-core to v2.4.0
